ValidationRule.description: If Area of Focus is Mobile Support other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Area_of_Focus__c,'Mobile Support'), ( ISPICKVAL( Mobile_Customer_s_Operation_System_Lang__c , '') || ISBLANK( Mobile_Customer_s_Operating_System__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Area of Focus is Mobile Support, then you must populate a value in the following fields: Mobile OS Version, and Mobile Customer's Operating System Language
